creditline: Gift of Christopher Monkhouse in honor of Enrique and Jennifer Olivarez
description: slightly tapering cylinder on concave base; thin handle and long, thin spout; conical cover with round knob; blue, orange, maroon and green geometric and organic design around body
dimension: H.10 x W.8-1/2 x D.4-3/8 in. (overall)
markings: \'BAVARIA/[coat of arms]/SCHUMANN/ARZBERG/GERMANY\' and \'[backwards] 6\', in green, on bottom; \'1500/5\', stamped into clay, on bottom
title: Coffee Pot
